title: 342 6 "The Zombie’s Secret! Hogback’s Nightmarish Laboratory!"Transliteration: "Zonbi no Nazo! Akumu no Hogubakku Kenkyūsho" (Japanese:ゾンビの謎! 悪夢のホグバック研究所) Directed by: Hiroshi MatsuzakaStoryboarded by: Kenji Yokoyama Tsuyoshi Sakurai February 10, 2008(2008-02-10)[8] April 17, 2016
transformers_text: 342 6 The Zombie s Secret Hog back s Nightmarish Laboratory Transliteration Zon bi no Nazo Aku mu no Hog u bak ku K enky sho Japanese Directed by Hiroshi Matsu zak a Story boarded by Kenji Yokoyama Tsuyoshi Sakurai February 10 2008 2008 02 10 8 April 17 2016 While evading the Surprise Zombies upon finding a secret passage Nami Chopper and Us opp discover the truth about Victoria C in dry being a starlet who died long ago They eventually found the door to Hog back's laboratory observing the scientist from outside before they are found by a mysterious samurai zombie who sounds like Brook Meanwhile Luffy's group are ambushed by ghosts who briefly made them depressed before they reach the graveyard where they are ambushed by the zombies
